JobTitle: PDM Consulting Conversion Specialist-Core Business Operations
JobFullDesc: Conversion Specialist  Are you an experienced, passionate pioneer in technology? A cloud solutions builder who wants to work in a collaborative environment. As an experienced Lead Java AWS Developer, you will have the ability to share new ideas and collaborate on projects as a consultant without the extensive demands of travel. Consider an opportunity with our US Project Delivery Practice.  Work you'll do/Responsibilities • Support product owners/scrum master to design and develop software solutions and assist in managing the product backlog • Support product owners/scrum master with the management of their development team's staff, including assignment of work items. • Support the creation, review and approval of software development specifications, projects, proposals, methods and schedules • Support the development, testing, debugging and implementation of software programs, applications and projects • Advise staff members on technical issues including specifying proper software designs and use of existing facilities to solve common problems • Monitor progress across a variety of initiatives and work packages • Provide inputs to the testing strategy and test plans for team's product.  The Team  The US Cloud Engineering Offering focuses on enabling our client's end-to-end journey from On-Premise to Cloud, with opportunities in the areas of Cloud Strategy and Op Model Transformation, Cloud Development & Integration, Cloud Migration, and Cloud Infrastructure & Managed Services. Cloud Engineering supports our clients as they improve agility, resilience and identifies opportunities to reduce IT operations spend through automation by enabling Cloud. We accelerate our clients toward a technology-driven future, leveraging vendor solutions, Deloitte-developed software products, tools, and accelerators.  Qualifications  Required  Retail/partnership card product experience  Project management and resource oversight  Large-scale retail partnership credit card portfolio conversion, including end-to-end activities such as data analysis/mapping, mock testing, cutover execution, and post-cutover warranty/transition activities  Conversion initiative for this project is part of broader partnership stand-up effort, including new product design/development/configuration/testing and launch activities  Conversion initiative also includes interaction with third parties such as core processor and selling bank issuer  Card/payments sector and technology experience, including specific TSYS platform knowledge  Customer account and portfolio conversion experience  Client management and cross-functional collaboration experience  Work within Deloitte client engagement team to serve financial services clients in planning and delivering credit card transformation initiatives, including account and data conversion initiatives  Interact directly with end clients as part of collaborative planning and delivery effort.  Bachelor's Degree preferably in Computer Science, Information Technology, Computer Engineering, or related IT discipline; or equivalent experience  Limited Sponsorship: Limited immigration sponsorship may be available.  Lead and manage individual resources and/or small pods/sub-teams within broader engagements where applicable. Travel up to 25% (While 25% of travel is a requirement of the role, due to COVID-19, non-essential travel has been suspended until further notice).
